parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.51

</value></part><part><name>game3</name>=<value> tkoh

</value></part><part><name>version3</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>game4</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version4</name>=<value> 0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Creates a new subject in the [[Diary]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> player '''createDiarySubject''' [subject, displayName, picture]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> player: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> subject: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> displayName: [[String]] - The visible name

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> picture: [[String]] - (Optional, default <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>""</value></part></template>) Icon to display next to the subject. Can be set later with [[setDiarySubjectPicture]]. Similar to [[lbSetPictureRight]].

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] - Index of the entry that was added

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_index = [[player]] [[createDiarySubject]] ["myPage","My page"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeDiarySubject]] [[processDiaryLink]] [[createDiaryLink]] [[createDiaryRecord]] [[diarySubjectExists]] [[setDiarySubjectPicture]] [[allDiarySubjects]]
</value></part></template></root>
